content: Ciao, non è possibile avere la vecchia interfaccia su Thunderbird 115. L'unica opzione in tal senso è tornare alla versione precedente (Thunderbird 102 che tuttavia non verrà più aggiornata in futuro, con tutti i limiti del caso)
creator: @next

content: I eventually was able to revert the layout to what it was previously. Isn't the layout stored in our profiles so it shouldn't change?
creator: eugbug1

content: Open Account Settings and select a Comcast account in the left pane, e.g. the one with username1@comcast.net. Then click Edit SMTP server in the right pane. Is the User Name for the smtp username1@comcast.net or something else? Repeat for other accounts and report which, if any, have a mismatch between the account address and the smtp User Name.
creator: sfhowes
